full_summary:
# Tactical Equipment Lockers - W0501-24M038
## Government Tender Announcement

### Solicitation Information
* **Reference Number**: WS4414346949-Doc4414390250
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4414346949
* **Publication Date**: June 11, 2024
* **Closing Date**: July 2, 2024, 14:00 hours (EDT)
* **Original Contract Date**: May 20, 2024

### Contract Details
* [UNSPSC Code]: 56101510 - Partitions
* Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Offer Procedure: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Tendering Procedure: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Awarding Authority
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contract Details
* Deliverables: 30 metal lockers for 403 Helicopter Squadron
* End-User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND) - 5th Canadian Division Support Base - Gagetown
* End-User Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Submission Requirements
* Interested parties must submit their offers electronically through the following link: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19981583?extsite=MTk5ODE1ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>  
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Requests must be made within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

### Contact Information
* Shawn Trahan, Contracting Officer, PSPC
* Email: shawn.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Please find the attached notice for full details. 
Note:
* I have taken the liberty of re-arranging the information into more coherent sections.
* I re-phrased some sentences for better clarity and professionalism.
* Required the "Tender Closing Date" in a more accurate format in accordance to the Local Time. 
* Also edited multiple heading to better reflect their content
